title: Tanganyika: new nation

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Africa - Social conditions
description: A record of HRH Prince Philip's visit to Tanganyika during the Independence celebrations. After arrival in the capital city, Dar es Salaam, the Duke, with the then Prime Minister, Julius Nyerere, is seen attending several events to mark the occasion, including a tattoo and display, the Independence Day Ceremonial, a reception at Government House, and the State Opening of the Tanganyika Parliament.
